amendment.description: An amendment consisting of the text of H.R. 2517, as modified by the amendments printed in the report accompanying H. Res. 245, and considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 245.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by the Committee on Rules.
Amendment agreed to pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 245.
